arts.ttl: Chelsea and Club Brugge beaten to the punch as Anderlecht sign young Malian winger
arts.sum: Anderlecht have signed Ibrahima Kanaté (18) from the Afrique Football Elite set-up in his native Mali. He joins up with the RSCA Futures side.

arts.ttl: Former PSV and Brentford defender leaves Anderlecht for Los Angeles
arts.sum: Mathias Jørgensen (34) has left Anderlecht for LA Galaxy. The MLS club announced the Danish centre-back's arrival on Wednesday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Official | Adryelson joins Anderlecht on loan from Lyon
arts.sum: Lyon centre-back Adryelson (26) has signed for Belgian side RSC Anderlecht on loan, both clubs have announced. The Brazilian centre-back joined Olympique Lyonnais from Botafogo last January over a €3,5m…

arts.ttl: Charleroi lure promising striker Alexandre Stanić away from Royal Antwerp
arts.sum: Charleroi have announced the signing of promising young forward, Alexandre Stanić (20) from Royal Antwerp. His new contract runs to 2026.

arts.ttl: Anderlecht bring in Brazilian defender Adryelson until the end of the season
arts.sum: Anderlecht have strengthened their back-line with Adryelson (26). The Brazilian defender joins on loan from Lyon until the end of the season.
